styles.livee: display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; margin: 5px 0; padding: 10px; border: 2px solid #000; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease; background-color: #2e7d32; color: white;font-weight: bold;
styles.liveeName: flex: 2; text-align: center; color: white; font-weight: bold;
